system.description: The character is a master of battlefield medicine, capable of treating even the most grievous wounds with exceptional skill.
system.benefit: Character gains +20 to all Medicae Skill Tests. When providing First Aid, they ignore penalties for Heavily Damaged patients, and only suffer a -10 penalty for those suffering Critical Damage.

specialAbilities.name: Enhanced First Aid
specialAbilities.description: Ignore penalties for Heavily Damaged patients. Only suffer -10 penalty for Critical Damage.
